meanings.definition: Inflammation of the sinuses, typically causing symptoms such as congestion, facial pain, and headache.
meanings.sent1: Sinusitis can make your face hurt and cause a headache.
meanings.sent2: I have sinusitis, so my nose is stuffy and my head hurts.
meanings.sent3: Why did the congested sinuses go to the party? For a headache!
meanings.sent4: Her sinuses were like a traffic jam, causing a painful backup - that's sinusitis.
meanings.sent5: The inflammation in his sinuses felt like a balloon expanding in his head - that's sinusitis.

meanings.definition: An infection or inflammation of the sinuses, often resulting in nasal congestion and difficulty breathing.
meanings.sent1: Sinusitis can make it hard to breathe through your nose.
meanings.sent2: My doctor said I have sinusitis because my sinuses are infected and swollen.
meanings.sent3: Why did the inflamed sinuses start a band? They wanted to play 'Nose Jam'!
meanings.sent4: Her sinusitis was like a storm brewing in her nose, causing a congestion downpour.
meanings.sent5: The infection in his sinuses felt like tiny warriors battling inside his nose - that's sinusitis.
